tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Rashmi is an absolute gem in the dental field! Their expertise and attention to detail are unparalleled. Not only did they address my dental concerns with precision, but they also took the time to ensure I felt comfortable throughout the entire process. Their friendly demeanor and genuine care for their patients truly set them apart. I couldn't be happier with the results of my visit and highly recommend to anyone in need of top-notch dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is quite friendly and understands your problems very well. Also educates you about your issues and explains the way forward. Patients are not kept waiting for long time due to good time management. The ambience of the clinic is good. I would definitely refer my friends and acquaintance to this clinic. Keep up the good work of taking care of your patients

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Tooth Extraction,Composite tooth filling,Dental Cavity Filling,Scaling / Polishing,
review:
Dr. Rashmi Shetty at K.K. Memorial Dental Center is an exceptional dentist who provided me with outstanding care. I have been treated for four extractions and multiple composite fillings from her, and I am extremely satisfied with the results. Dr. Shetty's friendly and personable demeanour immediately put me at ease during each visit.

Her skill and expertise were evident as she performed the extractions and fillings with precision and care. Despite the complexity of the procedures, Dr. Shetty ensured that I experienced minimal discomfort throughout. Her ability to perform these treatments painlessly showcases her exceptional skills and dedication to patient comfort.

Dr. Rashmi Shetty's approachable nature and willingness to listen to my concerns and answer my questions made each visit a positive experience. She took the time to explain the procedures, providing me with a clear understanding of what to expect. This level of communication and patient involvement is a testament to her commitment to delivering personalized care.

The modern and up-to-date facility at K.K. Memorial Dental Center further enhanced my experience. The entire staff was welcoming, and the atmosphere was comfortable and calming. I appreciated the high level of professionalism exhibited by Dr. Shetty and her team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr explained the procedure in detail and the precautions to be taken post the implant. Gave valuable suggestions for future problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr. Rashmi for wisdom tooth extraction and cavity filling. All the dental appointments were very smooth and I never had to wait long at the clinic. Dr. Rashmi offered me honest medical advice and explained my dental issues to me in detail. She was always available to answer any queries I had about my treatment. The oral surgeon was very competent and extracted my wisdom teeth within 10-15 minutes on each occasion.  Doctor's assistants are also very helpful and follow up diligently for any issues you may face and help manage the smooth running of the clinic. I consulted Dr. Rashmi on a recommendation and I would in turn like to recommend her for resolving any dental issues you may have.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor Rashmi Shetty and her team of assistants is very friendly. Doctor Rashmi and her team conducts treatment in excellent manner. They have maintained cleanliness and ambience of the Dental clinic. I had gone to Doctor for removal of a milk tooth's residue and Dental Crown, it felt like a rebirth for the tooth. There was a time when I was very scared Doctor Rashmi and her team helped me calm down when I felt relaxed thats when the task was done and I felt very happy. As for the dental crown I am very happy. 
Doctor Rashmi does the task very carefully as a result my Dental crown has been a great success.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Extremely happy and satisfied with the care and treatment that I got from Dr Shetty, Dr Yash and Dr Sakshi. They were really polite and explained the entire treatment to me in layman’s term. They ensured that the pain subsides immediately. The entire team is really punctual and cares a lot about their patients. Even after my RCT treatment, the doctors took followups just to check with me if there is no pain and I’m not facing any issues. Will 10/10 recommend Dr Shetty and team for a one stop solution for all dental needs.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Do not trust them. I had gone to Dr. Yoban for braces consultation during which I also asked him to check if my teeth are healthy. He told me I need to get fillings done. So I went ahead with it. 
Dr. Rashmi was supposed to do my fillings but she made her intern/assistant do the work and didn't even bother to supervise it. At the moment I trusted everything but after getting the filling done I had pain for a month. I visited again for the pain and they told me that it's for some other reason which they've now fixed. I still had a lot of pain so I got it checked by someone else *** ***** *** **** ** ***** *** ***** * **** ***** ******* *** ******* ** ******** *** ***** *** ***** *** **** ******* **** **** ** *** ******** ***
I had no issues or pain when I first went to see them for braces. But now I'm getting a root canal done out of nowhere.

Not to forget, during the process i got injured on my lips too because the machine got stuck on it and she couldn't even notice until I raised my hand and stopped her.

Eventually I did not even go back to them for braces.

review: Dr. Rashmi Shetty is great at what she does. Giving the right opinion, advise and always there to help! Definitely recommend.  I went for my wisdom tooth extraction, and am really happy with my surgery, pre and post surgery process and their expertise.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Recently shifted from Borivali to chembur and was searching for a good dentist. Got to know about Dr. Shetty from a family friend and decided to visit. It was a very friendly experience and the best part was that the doctor gave practical solutions without insisting for "unnecessary" tests and dental procedures.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
**** ******  ** ** ********* ******** She took  time to explain every procedure which will take place in the due course of time during my braces treatment. Mrs. Shetty was very supportive and thorough while explaining the process and offering multi options which will suit my pocket and health overall.  
I would recommend Mrs. Shetty to everyone because of her jovial nature, caring approach and great experience which makes the treatment smooth and easy for a sensitive human .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Single Sitting,Surgical Extractions of Teeth,
review: *** ** *** **** ** *** ****** ********. Would definitely recommend to reach out to her in case you have any dental issues. Clinic is very well sanitized. Regular temperature checks and all sort of precaution taken. She is very friendly. For people like me who have dental treatment phobia, don’t worry you guys are in the best hands here .

tags: Value for money,
review: I was really worried about the process and how painful it will be but I had a really good experience the doctor is very friendly and brings you to ease before the procedure and so that it goes smoothly. Very hygienic and we'll maintained clinic with very friendly and helpful staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had my root canal treatment  done at K K memorial Dental Centre with Dr Rashmi Shetty . It was painless and comfortable procedure . The ambience of clinic is very good .Thy follow strict sterilization protocols .Staff is very good . Also follow ups are done regularly .Would recommend to all..!!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Was under treatment with Dr. Rashmi Shetty for a root canal & capShe explained every step in detail and consciously made an effort to ensure my comfort through out the treatment.She is clinical and methodical in her way of working and is always willing and approachable for any queries.The clinic maintains highest standards of hygiene and they follow all safety protocols.Relieved and grateful to Dr. Rashmi and her efficient team for their services.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got all my wisdom tooth removed from Dr. Rashmi Shetty. Initially I was extremely scared because wisdom teeth removal are supposed to hurt, but she made sure to calm me down. She removed my wisdom tooth in minutes and it was ABSOLUTELY PAINLESS. I am grateful for this painless experience. I also get my other dental treatments done from their centre and they have an absolutely amazing staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have a major jaw lock problem because of which I can't open my mouth wide enough. So, when it comes to any dental treatment, this is an issue. Dr. Rashmi patiently handles this problem and cooperates very well. 
Also, she always explains the dental treatment process, and never leaves any ambiguity about the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is very friendly and caring and explains the procedure very well. The clinic is very good and the ambience is great. They explain everything in detail and clarify all doubts.Even the visiting surgeon was very good and experienced. I would recommend people to try it out.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience with Dr. Rashmi Shetty on the whole was very very good... She is very friendly, caring, patient and explains the procedure very well... Even the visiting Surgeon was very good and experienced.The staff too are cordial and friendly and makes you feel at ease.... Highly recommend this clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My experience with Dr. Rashmi Shetty was truly exceptional. From the outset, she took the time to thoroughly explain the procedure, alleviating any anxieties I may have had. My molar teeth were in a very bad state, but Dr. Shetty made every effort to save them, explaining the reasons for extraction and addressing all my concerns with genuine care and understanding. The extraction and implant process went seamlessly and without any pain, demonstrating her remarkable expertise and unwavering commitment to my well-being. I was deeply impressed by Dr. Shetty's dedication to ensuring my comfort throughout the entire treatment, and her exceptional post-treatment care left me feeling secure and well-cared for during my recovery. Not only did Dr. Shetty provide a flawless implant result, but she also fully restored my trust in dental procedures. For anyone seeking exceptional dental care with a personal touch, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Rashmi Shetty.

A big thanks for bringing my mums smile back.

I visited Dr. Rashmi at K.K. Memorial dental clinic for my tooth pain and had my tooth scaling done from Dr. Sakshi.
Dr. Rashmi is very caring and patient and explained everything in detail.
Clinic is very clean. The staff members and Dr. Sakshi were very friendly and polite.
Recommended for your dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had visited the doctor for my teeth problem as all my upper teeth had broken with fragments remaining excepting two teeth which were intact but we're shaking. She recommended that I go in for an implant with bridge taking into account that I am a professional and need to go out for official work. She loaded temporary tooth bridge so that I can eat as well as go about my normal duties. My treatment is now complete and am happy with the outcome.
